transcript_chunks.text: on the kind of funny scale that's a 9 out of 10 video game that's just a straight up amazing video game it is so much fun that is the best it's probably a 10 out of 10 to be honest with you cuz like this is my favorite Resident Evil game of all time which is crazy to say that
